body_html:
Actually yeah, I investigated further and it was just that I did not make the seq_len long enough to allow for the blanks to be between the labels, so thus "No Valid Path Found"

Though I'm confused about your earlier comment @ebrevdo where you said it's not the documentation but the code that is wrong. The unit test linked and @igormq seems to show merge_repeated demonstrating the correct behavior?

body:
Actually yeah, I investigated further and it was just that I did not make the seq_len long enough to allow for the blanks to be between the labels, so thus "No Valid Path Found"

Though I'm confused about your earlier comment @ebrevdo where you said it's not the documentation but the code that is wrong. The unit test linked and @igormq seems to show merge_repeated demonstrating the correct behavior?
